Customised resetZoom Button of highcharts plots

Source: R/utils.R
customChart.Rd

Customised resetZoom Button of highcharts plots

customChart(hc, chartType, zoomType = "None", width = 0, height = 0)

Arguments

hc

A highcharter object

chartType

The type of the plot

zoomType

The type of the zoom (one of "x", "y", "xy", "None")

width

xxx

height

xxx

Value

A highchart plot

Author

Samuel Wieczorek

Examples

library("highcharter")
#> Highcharts (www.highcharts.com) is a Highsoft software product which is
#> not free for commercial and Governmental use
hc <- highchart() 
hc_chart(hc,type = "line") 


hc_add_series(hc,data = c(29, 71, 40))


customChart(hc,filename='foo')
#> Error in customChart(hc, filename = "foo"): unused argument (filename = "foo")
